newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Almost 1.2 mln seek SingTel shares.
newsitem.headline: Almost 1.2 mln seek SingTel shares.

text.p: Nearly 1.2 million people had applied for shares in state telephone monopoly Singapore Telecommunications Ltd by September 7, the Ministry of Finance said on Monday.
The ministry said in a statement that more than one million applicants had been allocated their shares in the government's second public offering.
The closing date for shares acceptance is noon (0400 GMT) on Friday, September 13.

Every adult Singapore citizen is entitled to apply for 500 SingTel shares at a discounted price of Singapore $2.50 each. Members of the Singapore armed forces are allowed to buy a slightly higher number of shares.
The Ministry of Finance has said it expected more than one billion SingTel shares would be sold through the offer.
SingTel shares closed on Monday at S$3.22.
